title: End game screen loading time.
body:
After every finished game I click the "victory" button and it takes forever to go to the end game screen. It'll be idle at the "victory" screen for around 3 minutes then it finally shows the end game screen but everyone has already left. Also, sometimes after I click the "victory" button it goes to the end game screen right away but with nothing on it except the message "skip waiting for stats". It eventually loads after a while.

This happens literally all the time.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having a hard time getting reconnected to the client lobby. This might have something to do with your network settings like firewalls or DNS, but let's be sure to hit the major points by following the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
